          <title>
            <string language="hu">Szent Patrik csengettyűjének ereklyetartója, 8.század, Dublin, National Museum of Ireland, drágakő-berakásos arany.</string>
            <string language="en">The relic repository of Saint Patrick's hand-bell, 8th century, Dublin, National Museum of Ireland, precious stone encrusted gold</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Reliktbehälter Heiliger Patricks der 
Hand-Glocke, 8. Jahrhundert, Dublin, nationales Museum von Irland, 
verkrustetes Gold des kostbaren Steins</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le dépôt de relique de la main-cloche de Saint 
Patrick, 8ème siècle, Dublin, musée national de l'Irlande, or 
encroûté de pierre précieuse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O repositório do relic do mão-sino de Saint 
Patrick, 8o século, Dublin, museu nacional de Ireland, ouro encrusted
da pedra preciosa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il deposito del relic della mano-flangia del San 
Patrick, ottavo secolo, Dublino, museo nazionale dell'Irlanda, oro 
encrusted della pietra preziosa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η αποθήκη λειψάνων του χέρι-κουδουνιού Αγίου Πάτρικ,
8ος αιώνας, Δουβλίνο, εθνικό μουσείο της Ιρλανδίας, πολύτιμος 
λίθος ο χρυσός</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El depósito de la reliquia de la mano-alarma de 
Santo Patrick, 8vo siglo, Dublín, museo nacional de Irlanda, oro 
encrusted de la piedra preciosa</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Szent Patrik csengettyűjének ereklyetartója.</string>
